parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X position for the detail view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y position for the detail view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z position for the detail view

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Style for the detail view as defined in swDetViewStyle_e

parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Scale numerator

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Scale denominator

parameters.name: LabelIn
parameters.description: Detail view label

parameters.name: Showtype
parameters.description: Type of sketch for the detail view as defined in swDetCircleShowType_e

parameters.name: FullOutline
parameters.description: True to show a full outline, false to not; valid only if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: JaggedOutline
parameters.description: True to show a jagged outline, false to not; only valid if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: NoOutline
parameters.description: True to not show an outline, false to show an outline

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Intensity of jagged outline; valid range is 1 (most) to 5 (least) and only valid if JaggedOutline is true and NoOutline is false

title: IDrawingDoc.CreateDetailViewAt4
description: Creates a detail view in a drawing document.
signature:
System.Object CreateDetailViewAt4( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
,
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Double
Scale1
,
   System.Double
Scale2
,
   System.String
LabelIn
,
   System.Int32
Showtype
,
   System.Boolean
FullOutline
,
   System.Boolean
JaggedOutline
,
   System.Boolean
NoOutline
,
   System.Int32
ShapeIntensity
)

parameters.name: X

parameters.description: Y position for the detail view

parameters.name: Scale1
parameters.description: Scale numerator

parameters.name: Scale2
parameters.description: Scale denominator

parameters.name: LabelIn
parameters.description: Detail view label

parameters.name: Showtype
parameters.description: Type of sketch for the detail view as defined in swDetCircleShowType_e

parameters.name: FullOutline
parameters.description: True to show a full outline, false to not; valid only if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: JaggedOutline
parameters.description: True to show a jagged outline, false to not; only valid if NoOutline is false

parameters.name: NoOutline
parameters.description: True to not show an outline, false to show an outline

parameters.name: ShapeIntensity
parameters.description: Intensity of jagged outline; valid range is 1 (most) to 5 (least) and only valid if JaggedOutline is true and NoOutline is false
